p.s: I hope you and your family are doing good.
I know that you think that student exchanges are a waste of time, but let me tell you my thoughts and arguments.
So the first argument is that you get to know new people and language, for example englishEnglish.
It is useful because it is the world language and you can speak it almost everywhere.
It is also a good argument, that you can study in better universitysuniversities or universitysuniversities that don't even exist in your country.
The last argument is that you can visit cities like London, New York or Paris and try out new food.

I hope I could change your mind.
Have a good day and let me hear about you!
